lenders.name: Rosa
lenders.loan_because: I am a student of haute couture and I put my internet booths, which is why I need $ 600 dollars, please help me with this money, repayable in 12 months reason for 50 dollars per month, many thanks, I finish my studies and I have no money, thank you thank you

I will continue to give to this fund and hope that all that receive use the funds to make life better for the world.  To be able to assist someone in their dream or life sustaining efforts is truly an honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I researched the legal sectors of many different areas of the law as it applied to societal needs.  I also am 12 credits short of my BS in Elementary Education.  I enjoy reading, working with the elderly and children and I want to do something with the third world country before I get too old.  I know I can contribute my energy, love and knowledge to make the world a safer and beautiful place.

lenders.name: Bjørn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people build their own future, using their own skills.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an craftsman, repairing old wood-buildings, in an small Norwegian museum.

lenders.name: Ms. Whiffin
lenders.loan_because: We are a grade 4/5 class at Anmore Elementary.  We are learning about the world and how we can make a difference. We have been lending to Kiva now for over a year.  In the first year, we raised over $1100 as a class.  This year, we have already reloaned the money that has come back to us (approximately $775).  My students this year have also embarked on their own fundraising efforts to give them a chance to connect to the project.  Amazingly, they have raised over $1300 so far!!!  The fun part is making the loan!  Each of us chooses a project and researches the region, community and business to determine which project we will support.  The kids are so aware of the world!   They also use statistics to justify their decisions and have become amazing at working with all kinds of numbers.  Hurray for Kiva!

lenders.name: Team PAB
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to contribute goodness to deserving people.
lenders.occupational_info: We help families grow.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: thanks to the support and encouragement of my my friends and family, I have been extremely blessed. I want to support others in realizing their dreams as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and blogs and stuff.

lenders.name: Radhika
lenders.loan_because: A small good deed is better than a big good intention. I know the anguish of being in need of money; today I have it; I want to share it.
lenders.occupational_info: Working towards living life's true worth. Ever thought how beautiful the world will be if each one of us was truly humane towards just 1 fellow being ?

lenders.name: Russ
lenders.loan_because: I have always been facinated by the possiblities of microcredit. For a relatively very tiny amount of capital you can help someone in the developing world to make a difference in their lives. When they repay the loan you can help someone else with the same capital!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers. I focus on lean management techniques and processes data management at one of the top software companies in the world.

lenders.name: Prad
lenders.loan_because: Giving at the the right moment is more generous than giving much.

lenders.occupational_info: We are getting old at 73+ years. We are all one body,one great  family.

lenders.loan_because: It's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit agency that helps people with mental illness to reclaim their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I make photographs of things people want to buy.

lenders.name: Rachna and Rachita
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense to lend people a helping hand to help them stand on their own feet.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Part of venture capital is to provide the necessary funds to start-up enterprises in exchange for a piece of the company in the hope that it does well enough to realize financial gain.  Here is a similar idea in a much more direct and heartfelt way.  Giving a bit of assistance to a growing enterprise, not in search of financial return, but for the betterment of the world as a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in large refineries around the world helping them improve their operations.  Currently, I work in my company's venture capital division, investing in ideas and technology developed in start-up companies that can  help improve operations and help sustain our future.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I can help people outside of my (usually) comfortable environment do things I take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep companion animals (cats, dogs, birds, hamsters, etc.) healthy.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: By giving someone a hand up instead of a hand out we empower one another to build a better future for the world we live in.

lenders.name: Hannah & Jared
lenders.loan_because: hope is a powerful thing.
lenders.occupational_info:
Human Resources - Working within the company department charged with finding, screening, recruiting and training job applicants, as well as administering employee-benefit programs.

US Government - Weapons repair/training

lenders.name: UC EAP Regional Team
lenders.loan_because: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it. -Albert Einstein
lenders.occupational_info: Dedicated to programs in Asia and Africa

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Tiziana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone a chance!

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: If I have the opportunity to help my neighbor, I should.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: i love the fact that i may only have a small amount of money myself but i can still make a massive difference in another persons life.

lenders.name: Deidre
lenders.loan_because: You can't keep it, if you don't give it away.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I AM A TRENDSETTER!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mathematics graduate student.

lenders.name: Reza
lenders.loan_because: it is a way for me to make at least a little difference in the world.

lenders.name: J
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower those trying to make an honest living for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: David Taylor-Klaus
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending moves the global economy at the only level that works ... at the community level.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with people facing change - either changing by choice or having change thrust upon them - to:
     • Focus on and define their core values,
     • Create Clarity around what is important to change,
     • Build an Action plan for forward motion, and
     • Provide support for them as they move forward.

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: Family Christmas Gift
lenders.occupational_info: Insurance

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I belive in productivity. There should be no reason a person cannot access resources if  they want to be a productive person in thier community. I believe in hard work and self determination, not laziness and apathy.

lenders.name: J & the Boxers
lenders.loan_because: others deserve the opportunity to improve their financial situation.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.occupational_info: Giving microloan recipients and other entrepreneurs the skills they need to make better business decisions

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior in High School in Hollister, California.  I hope to go to college next year and study biology and then I hope to become a doctor one day.

lenders.name: Veena.N.K
lenders.loan_because: I am a Chef, a Food Consultant, Restaurant & a Food Critic.  My motto is to 'Eradicate hunger from the world".  I am willing to do my part.  Whether it is by volunteering, by preparing and serving food and by donating as much as I can.  Something about people going without food touches me a lot.  I don't want to ever hear people suffering ever and not from hunger for sure.  So I want to do my part and I strongly encourage other people to do their part as well.
lenders.occupational_info: My specialty is Global, Asian, Vegetarian and Vegan food.  I help people to change their lifestyles to adapt and to include healthier ways and nutritious food in their daily diet.  I help organizations with menu planning, training employees to get them familiarized with the world of spices, to teach them to cook Asian food and  show them how to combine and use the spices to their advantage.

lenders.name: The Adams'
lenders.loan_because: We want to show our children that you should help others if you are able.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to pass some of that on.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the state's largest electric utility.  I tell homeowners, developers, cities where they are going to place electric lines, poles, transformers.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I am excited by the opportunity to help someone better their own lives as well as their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor in Internal Medicine.

lenders.name: miriam & saray
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to provide others with the opportunity to succeed and feel a sense of self-worth and self-actualization.

lenders.name: Mark & Lori
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with enough to share.

lenders.name: Regis Microlending Group
lenders.loan_because: we are socially responsible students learning about international finance!
lenders.occupational_info: We are students of international finance, and we are striving to explore issues of risk, credit, microlending, and the global economy.  We will be graduating soon and are currently studying various fields within business.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to change their lives.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because:
Microcredit loans empower the poor to lift themselves out of poverty. Through microfinance, they can secure better nutrition, education, healthcare, and housing for their families.

The poor don't lack motivation, drive, or ability. They lack opportunity. There are millions and millions of impoverished people around the world who don't have access to financial services, and the faster we are able to get it to them, the better!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying business and minoring in international development. My hope is to use my major to empower women in developing countries!

lenders.name: Christopher Robins RMT
lenders.loan_because: I was helped to start my business and continue to be helped and inspired by my wonderful clients. It is in appreciation of their support that I show my gratitude to them by "paying it forward" The world is so full of wonderful people and places and Kiva allows us in some small way to reach out to those people and places. If all the hands that reach could touch....Peace.

lenders.name: Dyk
lenders.loan_because: I believe the imbalance in wealth in the world is morally wrong and this is a small way of redressing that.

lenders.name: Rasmus
lenders.loan_because:
I expect to double my investment!
..........
WHAT was that you said?
Non-for-profit?
lenders.occupational_info: I do what I do here at Kiva - lend money

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: without a loan I could never have got started in life
lenders.occupational_info: I work to promote sustainability - to consider the environment, our natural capital and future generations in all that we do

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: nice to share
lenders.occupational_info: Produce music concerts

lenders.name: Siv
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach small children at a primary school.

lenders.name: Hanne
lenders.loan_because: I can!  And this is a great way of making a little go a long way...
lenders.occupational_info: Communication

lenders.name: Einar & Anne-May
lenders.loan_because: We have felt the hard times and long work hours building up a company and stabilising it (took almost 10 years starting from 0), thats why we admire people trying to make their own business and are more than happy trying to make their road to success hopefully a little bit easier.
lenders.occupational_info:
Started own company in 1996.
The company has today 6-8 employees performing surface treatment, flooring and termoplastic coating. Our work is today manageing the company with all from getting contracts, safety & quality assurance, ordering products, as well as all the paperwork regarding payments, taxes etc.

lenders.name: Constantinos
lenders.occupational_info: I run a manufactory and retail shop with wigs for women and men.

lenders.name: jujin
lenders.loan_because: they deserve a better life.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: my work is successful ...

lenders.name: Parent Advocates
lenders.loan_because:
We are a group of citizen advocates. We are parents with disabled dependents and children with additional needs. We asked our family and friends to send Kiva gift certificates instead of cards and presents at Christmas. 

We especially want to be connected with parents working to support their families. Every parent we have ever met simply wants their children to have a better childhood than their own childhood ever was. All children are our children! All children deserve this! 

We have created a Kiva page on the Parent Advocates Together (PAT) website and our organisation now sponsors a number of Kiva loans. There is also a Facebook fan page for our group at http://www.facebook.com/pages/Parent-Advocates-Together/242685595777297?sk=wall so please do click this link and 'like' or page to show your support.

> We champion the needs of vulnerable individuals, disadvantaged communities and excluded groups.
> We work to break the cycle of deprivation, to promote informed choices, and to encourage independence and self-efficacy.
> We engage with commissioners, service providers and community stakeholders to develop beneficial outcomes for all citizens regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, age, disability, orientation or any other background.
lenders.occupational_info:
We believe that people will achieve more by working together than they can by working alone. We support the efforts of those who seek success through that co-operative endeavour.

We believe that the only way to create a just and fair society is through power being spread evenly throughout society, and not arbitrarily based on wealth, class, gender or race.

lenders.name: Matt & Lynda
lenders.loan_because:
1 John 3:17-18 
If we have all we need and see one of our own people in need, we must have pity on that person, or else we cannot say we love God. Children, you show love for others by truly helping them, and not merely by talking about it.

lenders.name: Hanne og Tore
lenders.occupational_info: One chemistry engineer and one biology student!

lenders.name: Kari Merete
lenders.loan_because: Because I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Hildegunn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help...

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that these loans are a great way to help people help themselves…

lenders.name: Trond Leonard
lenders.loan_because: The world has not spread its goods fairly, this is the only way for me to try evening it out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a salesmanager within an icecream company.

lenders.name: Cathrine
lenders.loan_because: I can and I think it is a wonderful way of helping people with initiative to improve their lives with hard work
lenders.occupational_info: Enjoying time with my small children while living abroad from my native Norway

lenders.name: Powder
lenders.loan_because: I want to help who needs

lenders.name: Daniel Milford Flathagen
lenders.loan_because: «What's the greatest gift one human being can give to another? A future.» –Ben Horne

lenders.name: B. Right Solvang
lenders.loan_because:
It is not charity, it's a loan. Fair and square. A tool to get you going. It's your sweat.

Give a man one fish, he'll complain he ain't into sushi. Lend him the fish, then you've gone all Kiva on him.

Kiva - Paying it backward - Kinda...
lenders.occupational_info:
Who me? - Nobody.
A tiny cluster of atoms in an endless universe. - Trying to make my brief flash of life on this wet spinning rock, a tiny bit more bearable.

lenders.name: Brunswick WC Class
lenders.loan_because:
In our Brunswick World Culture's class, we are studying about the concept of culture and about specific cultures in Japan, Africa and the Middle East. We thought by loaning to men and women around the world we would not only learn more about people outside America but also help hard working folk to pursue their dreams and to take better care of their families.  Best of luck to all the people borrowing our money--may you all prosper!  

Samantha, Giorgio, Jack D., Alec, Willy, Jake, John, Christine, Caitlin, Amanda, Izzy, Michael, Caroline, Sander, James, Hannah, Jack W. and Mr. Booth!

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: Make a loan, change a life

lenders.name: Ina
lenders.loan_because: Brilliant consept

lenders.name: Gro
lenders.loan_because: I am an ordinary "girl" in one of the best and richest countrys in the world. I love to share !

lenders.name: fadipe
lenders.loan_because: i want expand my fish farm
lenders.occupational_info: i breed fish for sales

lenders.name: Natascha
lenders.loan_because: people should be able to support themselves and make an honest living.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a lot of satisfaction to help someone in need, and to make a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to teach international students E-Business & Computing courses at undergraduate level. Now work as a Business Development Strategist.

lenders.name: Marge
lenders.loan_because: Together - that's the only way life works
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an electronic library

lenders.name: Daniel & Oliver
lenders.loan_because: we can.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes people need a hand.

lenders.name: Maarten
lenders.loan_because: We are living in a privileged country, so by lending money we help people to build there own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, build and implement computer programs to support administrative work in specific departments within a big international airline company.

lenders.name: Roderick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance to alleviate poverty and improve the standard of living for many people in the less privileged parts of our world..
lenders.occupational_info: Check www.openceilings.nl for more info on my company.

lenders.name: Ola Jullumstro
lenders.loan_because: great way of helping people and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: communications

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: What a great opportunity to help others to help themselves. We all should do this!

lenders.name: Nova en Viggo
lenders.loan_because: It's the perfect way to support people all over the world, and learn my children they should be thankfull for what we have!

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: Simply because I want to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a christian and beside my job as a maintenance technician, I study at:
King's Evangelical Divinity School
Theology and Religious Studies
University of Wales
Lampeter
(United Kingdom) and hope to earn my bachelor's degree in theology within 3 years.

lenders.name: mustafa
lenders.loan_because: Ja kan beter mensen iets lenen zodat ze op eigen benen kunnen staan dan elke keer wat geven.
lenders.occupational_info: ondernemer

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed and improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of .net developers and designers.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky to be born in a rich country. Sharing this luck with people across the world is a pleasure.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use their computers in a way that is honest and efficient.

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lenders.name: Jaret
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit as well as supporting those who are trying to better themselves.

lenders.name: Khadija_Muslima
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Gi.von
lenders.loan_because: kiva offre à ceux d'entre nous qui le peuvent , une façon de venir en aide aux moins fortunés tout en leur permettant de sauvegarder leur dignité . Bravo .

lenders.name: katja
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. Kiva makes it easy and fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big hospital. I make general x-rays of lungs and bones. My specialisation is CT-scan: use x-rays to make digital "slices" of someone.

lenders.name: Mayla
lenders.occupation: student to become a primaryschool teacher

lenders.name: Randa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-credits
lenders.occupational_info: easy yet life-changing

lenders.name: Antoinette
lenders.loan_because: I recently (2005) started as an entrepreneur myself, in the translation field. I really enjoy my work and would like to support others to start and maintain their own businesses as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional English to Dutch translator, specializing in medicine (general, pharmaceuticals), health care, psychology, wildlife conservation, etc.

lenders.name: Griffin
lenders.loan_because: This account is being given to Griffin. It was originally a holiday gift to his grandmother from her daughter (Griffin's Mom) ... to prevent cycles such as poverty from haunting each subsequent generation. To make a positive difference in the world through the gift of self-sufficiency and to demonstrate what she always taught us was the "Spirit of Christmas" for people of all religions. Now, Griffin helps choose people based  on his own interests and what he thinks people should have access to.
lenders.occupational_info: As a former social worker and school volunteer, and after-school- care worker, my mother has helped improve the lives of many children. My son, Griffin, is an outgoing child who is full of love. He is 8 years old and in the fourth grade at Texas Virtual Academy.

lenders.name: Harm Jan
lenders.loan_because: Want to help people in need
lenders.occupational_info: I work on ships as an officer

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because:
Je crois à la force du pret par rapport au don quand les circonstances le permettent. Il est important que les personnes soient impliquées et motivées. C'est une des clefs du succès et du développement.
I believe in the strength of loan vs donation/gift under specific circumstances. Il is important  to be involved and motivated. This one of the sucess key for development.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an independant consultant for various organisations in France. I help these organisations to develop communication (between people), team building, efficiency through involvement & motivation.

lenders.name: Michael and Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed with having the money to do things to better our lives, and we'd simply like to pass that on to others, so that they may thrive and share that same happiness in their lives.

lenders.name: emmy
lenders.loan_because: I was in Africa with my sister, she adopted two children. We have seen so much poverty, now I can help a little bit to.
lenders.occupational_info: Housewife and mother from 3 daughters

lenders.name: Sander
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to help someone! They learn the need to be independend and be sucesful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a mayor airline and have my own marketing company.

lenders.name: Tad
lenders.loan_because: This is one way I can make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Quality Engineer at a National Laboratory where pure science and research is conducted. This is where the future is invented.

lenders.name: Karisse
lenders.loan_because:
This idea of micro-lending has the potential to improve our world and can give efficent support to people in developing countries.
It connects people with ideas and dreams with sources of finance from across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info:
We make a living by what we do, but we make a life by what we give.
-Winston Churchill

lenders.name: The Erbers
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be in a position to help others, and we remember when there was a time when we couldn't and needed help ourselves.

lenders.name: Jane D.
lenders.loan_because: I love this whole system of passing along some help to those who want to use their skills. It is so much better than blind charity, although that is great too.  Peace to all.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to get involved in small ways to make the world a little better in many everyday areas. But I like to remain in the background. KIVA is an example of what cold-hard technology can actually do to improve the world one person at a time. We lenders are equally improved.

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: I believe that I can be the change I want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional fundraising consultant.  I work with charities to help them be more effective in raising money to make change within their communitties.

lenders.name: Dimitri
lenders.loan_because: Such an easy little good thing to do, so why not?
lenders.occupational_info: Social Worker

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lenders.name: sharon
lenders.loan_because: Earth's future can be abundant with peace, love and happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a transportation engineer.

lenders.name: C
lenders.loan_because: It´s a very interesting way to help needed people. I´m very happy to help who only needs an opportunity...

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a chance to make a better life for them and family.
lenders.occupational_info: Three kids is hard work. Ask any mom.

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because: Anyone who works hard should have the chance to succeed. I especially want to help mothers.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: My brother gave me this as a birthday present, I am glad he did!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with homless women with children facing the crisis of homelessness.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It's a global village.  I like to help people when I have the means to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make books ready for publication.

lenders.name: Pi och Patrik
lenders.loan_because: We got an account here as a wedding-gift and it feels really good because it continues and we can help others get better lives hopefully
lenders.occupational_info: I work with kids in the ages between 10-16, my subjects are history, geography, social science and religion.

lenders.name: Tremayne Tatem
lenders.loan_because: Each One, Reach One.
lenders.occupational_info: I empower people to create wealth.

lenders.name: Morten
lenders.loan_because: Microlending has the potential to improve our world, helping people to take a step out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Thanks to Kiva for giving people around the world the possibility to help!

lenders.name: Maryanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that individuals can make a big difference through simple actions motivated by love.

lenders.name: Dion & Sabine
lenders.loan_because: We care...!

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: It encourages people to make an effort and I can target my donation to a person with a face and a history.
lenders.occupational_info: I am vicepresident in a large insurance company, managing 65 people in my department. I am responsible for the systems supporting sales and administration for the Mass Market.

lenders.name: Natasha
lenders.loan_because: the Kiva concept is amazing! It is so  important to make others financially independent. You encourage their self-worth by allowing them to earn a living, and you help to create a sustainable future for others.  They learn skills and secure a small business that will continue to feed their families, not only on a one-time basis, which is what tends to happen with most charitable gifts. Kiva encourages independence, but at the same time letting an aspiring entrepreneur in another country know they're not alone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the insurance field.

lenders.name: Jolanda
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives me the opportunity to give individual people worldwide a loan to support their business.

lenders.name: Bakatiloma
lenders.loan_because: The least I can do is share some of my 'fortune' with others.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that grassroots local action is the best option for sustainable development. Although being a student doesn't generate much income, one of the best aspects of Kiva is that a small initial contribution (which I can also get in the form of Kiva gift certificates for birthdays, Christmas, etc) can be reloaned over and over again once it's paid back. A great way to help out for those with no income!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recent graduate from Trent University, in Ontario, Canada. I studied politics, and specifically globalization and sustainable development.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: To lend a hand....

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: I think this idea could change the world, it is like the butterfly effect to me.  I think we all have a responsibilty to give something to this cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I love staying home during the week with my son, and I bartend on the weekends.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small businesses around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on migration and refugee issues.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I believe that "chances given" are as  important as "chances received".
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in finding homes for their families.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: I would rather invest in the future of my fellow citizens of the world than spend $25 on anything else.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great and direct way of helping people take charge of their own future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people and computers, in government and banks, in The Netherlands and sometimes abroad, for example in Bolivia and India.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because:
It is important to work together with my kids to show them how we can make small changes in order to make the world a better place.  We have traveled in SE Asia and were especially touched in Cambodia...we walked away feeling kicked in the head by a huge dose of reality.  We can't be there to help at this very moment, so we can at least do a little bit as we are able, here.  

Shawn is my 18yo stepson who is very socially conscious and who actually asked for a kiva donation for his Christmas gift.  It was a good way to start us off.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have many roles in our family.  I support my husband while he runs his business, I run my own small crafting business...selling my products in stores and at markets. My most important job is teaching my children. 

Shawn is a grade 12 student who has just been accepted to University in the engineering department.  He has always been globally conscious, but as an almost adult, he recognizes our place of privilege and feels a need to help.  

As a family we enjoy playing, deep discussions around the dinner table, camping and traveling.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: we gotta help each other if we can .
lenders.occupational_info: heavy

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: there is nothing more fulfilling than seeing these wonderful people build a better life for themselves. To whom much is given much is expected.

lenders.name: Chip L
lenders.loan_because: It makes the world smaller.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur and serial networker connecting the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: This is my way of helping other people around the world who have a dream of changing their lives and the lives of their families for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a happy housewife who loves to lend a hand!  My husband, who is from India, loves the whole concept of Kiva and hopes to see micro loans available to people back home in southern India :D

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that business can do amazing things.
lenders.occupational_info: Read, Research, Write, Repeat

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay-at-home father.

lenders.name: Cisca en Rob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to make their own business so they can earn their own money.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to learn how they can use their money on a responsable way.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: This makes people's lives better.

lenders.name: SueB
lenders.loan_because: It drives home that I can make a fundamental difference at the grassroots - one loan at a time...
lenders.occupational_info: I like lending to single women with children; those looking to buy tools/equipment for their trade;  ventures which could have a domino effect , for example, by sustaining employees or generating benefits for other local businesses depending on it (example, transportation).

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It's my small way to give back to our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies
